bio: Windhelm's enigmatic tapestry molds my destiny as Vera Needle, an Argonian rogue, in my quest to carve my saga as Skyrim's premiere rogue. Proficient in sneaking and pickpocketing, the Windhelm catacombs become the clandestine arena where shadows intertwine with scales, birthing a rogue undaunted by the specter of the undead.
name: Vera Needle
